content:
# Factorio Agent Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, -0.5) connected to pipe at (-8.5, -0.5)
- Boiler at (-7.0, 3.5) with fuel inventory (43 coal)
- Steam engine at (-2.5, 3.5) producing 13500.0 kW
- Connected pipe network from (-8.5, -0.5) to (-5.5, 3.5)
- Power network with poles including at (0.5, 6.5) and (-2.5, 5.5)

### Oil Extraction and Storage System at position (17.5, 40.5)
Consists of:
- Pumpjack at (17.5, 40.5) working at 100% efficiency
- Storage tanks at:
  - (22.5, 40.5) containing 29.08 crude oil
  - (27.5, 40.5) containing 10.66 crude oil 
  - (32.5, 40.5) containing 3.50 crude oil
  - (37.5, 40.5) - newly added
  - (42.5, 40.5) - newly added
- Connected pipe network spanning from (18.5, 38.5) to (30.5, 41.5)
- Power network with poles including at (15.5, 39.5) and (32.5, 45.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Prototype reference errors
- When referencing entity dimensions, use correct prototype names (occurred when trying to access Prototype.Pumpjack instead of Prototype.PumpJack)

### Entity placement errors
- Verify inventory contains required items before placement (occurred when trying to place steel-chest without having one)
- Check for existing entities before placing new ones (occurred when placing wooden-chest at occupied position (32.5, 45.5))

### Fluid system monitoring
- Avoid accessing stale entity data when checking fluid boxes (occurred when checking offshore pump status)
- Ensure proper fluid measurement methods are used (storage tanks don't have 'contents' attribute)

### Power network considerations
- When extending power networks, ensure sufficient pole spacing and clear paths
- Verify power connections after placement to confirm operational status

### Factory maintenance
- Monitor boiler fuel levels regularly (current: 43 coal remaining)
- Check pipe connections periodically for optimal fluid flow
- Expand storage when tanks reach 80% capacity

### API usage
- The nearest() function doesn't accept 'position' keyword argument - check correct parameter usage
- Storage tanks don't have 'contents' attribute - use appropriate fluid measurement methods
